description.ko: 유기적 생명체와 첨단 기술이 융합된 세계로의 숨막히는 시각적 여정입니다. 이 시리즈는 디지털 아티팩트, 맥동하는 데이터, 합성 발광을 통해 재해석된 자연의 아름다움을 탐구합니다.
description.en: A breathtaking visual journey into a world where organic life and advanced technology merge. This series explores the beauty of nature reinterpreted through digital artifacts, pulsing data, and synthetic luminescence.

prompt: A high-tech digital forest where translucent flowers are woven from glowing fiber-optic cables and liquid data streams, circuit board textures on broad leaves, bioluminescent spores floating in the air, glitch aesthetics, volumetric neon lighting, 8k resolution, cinematic atmosphere, synthwave color palette.
